revision.comment: /* top */ clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix
revision.text:

|brand = Radxa |model = Zero |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = V1.51 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = D2E8 |wlclass = AC600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = 2A3PA-RADXA-ZERO |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Amlogic;S905Y2; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARMv8-A |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1spd = 1.2 GHz <!-- 1.8 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Kingston;EMMC08G-T227; |flash1size = 8 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = SK hynix;H9HCNNNBKUML-HRNME; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_none = true |oui = 20:50:E7
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2015.01-g7386aaa;; |stockos = Linux;4.9.113;Android 9;
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0, USB 3.1, Micro SD Card slot |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 3.33 |pwr_conn = USB (Type-C) Female
|serial = yes,, via GPIO header,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Micro SD Card slot, Micro HDMI 2.1, Bluetooth 5.0 BLE, SPI, I2C, I2S, SPDIF, ADC, GPIO |addchip = USB 3.1 Superspeed 10 Gbps Switch;On Semi;FUSB340;;1;,,, Programmable USB Type-C Controller w/ PD;On Semi;FUSB302B;;1;,,, 4-Bit Bidirectional Voltage-Level Translator;Union Semi;UM3204;;1;,,, Low Noise High Speed LDO Linear Regulator;Will Semi;WL2810;;1;,,, 5V 1A USB Power Distribution Switch;Silergy;SY6280AAC;;1;,,, 1A Synchronous Step-Down Converter;MPS;MP1601A;;4;,,, 2A Synchronous Step-Down Converter;MPS;MP1605;;2;,,, 2.63V Reset IC;RayStar Microelectronics;RS809R;;1;,,, 4 Channel ESD Protection Device;TI;TPD4E05U06;;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = Armbian, Manjaro ARM, RetroPie
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 12/17/2021 |estreldate = 06/2021 |estprice = 30 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = SparkLAN AP6256 |rad1modif = SDIO 3.0 |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43456; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |rad1ac = 433 |rad1n = 150/150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "Radxa Zero V1.4" is silkscreened on board top.
{{See also|Radxa|List of Single-board computers}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Amlogic]] S905Y2 Quad-Core ARM (Cortex-A53) @1.2GHz :GPU: ''Mali-G31 MP2'' (OpenGL ES3.2, OpenCL, AFBC) :VPU (with 4K VP9 and 4K 10-bit H265/H264 decoding) *Storage: 16GB (eMMC), TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card slot *Memory: 4GB (LPDDR4) SDRAM *Wi-Fi: [[SparkLAN AP6256]] • [[Broadcom]] BCM43456 (1T1R) :SDIO 3.0 Wi-Fi, UART/PCM BT, 802.11abgn/ac, BT 5.0 *USB: 1x USB 3.0 (OTG), 1x USB 3.1 ports *GPIO: 1x 40-pin headers *Power Source: USB (Type-C) supporting USB PD 2.0 :and Qualcomm Quick Charge 3.0
==Links of Interest== *[https://linuxgizmos.com/tiny-radxa-zero-sbc-runs-armbian-on-amlogic-s905y2/ ''Tiny Radxa Zero SBC runs Armbian on Amlogic S905Y2'' on '''LinuxGizmos'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2021/06/16/radxa-zero-sbc-quad-core-raspberry-pi-zero-w-alternative/ ''Radxa Zero SBC'' on '''CNX|Software''' ]
